column3: JPja

ああ喜んでやらせてもらうぜ

怖れ知らずのダルケル様だ
このハイラルの危機となりゃ断る理由は何もねえ
column4:
Ah! Count me in, tiny princess.I'm the fearless Daruk, after all! And if Hyrule needs
my help, I'll gladly lay down my life.

column3: ありがとう ダルケル

厄災ガノンのせいかどうかは知らねえが
ここいらも魔物が増えて物騒になって来てる……
姫さんも城を離れる時は護衛を増やした方がいいと思うぜ？
column4:
Not sure if it's Calamity Ganon's fault or what,
but I hear monsters have been attacking people
more than ever lately.Times like these...you shouldn't leave the
castle without a horde of mighty Gorons
to watch your back.

column3:
今父が私に付ける騎士を選んでいるそうです……

候補者の一人は ハイラル王国一の剣士と聴いています……
column4:
You sound like Father. He's assigning a knight
to watch over me wherever I go.I hear the top contender is the most accomplished
swordsman in all of Hyrule.

column3: へえ そいつはまさか……

ん？
あれは……

奴ら本当に増えてきてやがるな

ん？
……誰か襲われてんのか？
column4: They really are all over the place these days.Hm? Is someone being attacked?

column3: 姫さん ちょっと待ってな
うおぉりゃあぁ！！（非表示）

ふん臆病な野郎共だ……

ま このダルケル様には どんな魔物も かないっこねえがな
column4:
Hmph! Spineless little cuccos!No monster stands a chance when fighting me,
the almighty Daruk!

column4:
Good riddance...and stay safe.
I'm sorry ya had to see that side o' me.As a kid, dogs always chased me.I still panic when I see one o' those critters.

column3: 貴方にも苦手なものがあるなんて意外でした

I never imagined the Great Daruk would
have a weakness.
